data.caption: Results - Financial Result - March 2024
data.news_body: This is to inform that Board of Directors of the Life Insurance Corporation of India at their meeting held today i.e., Monday, May 27, 2024 have approved Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial results for the quarter and year ended March 2024. They have also recommended a Final Dividend of Rs. 6/- per equity share for the financial year ended March 2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: This is to inform you that Board of Directors of Life Insurance Corporation of India (Corporation) have considered and approved the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results of the Corporation for the quarter and nine month ended December 31, 2023 and Declared an Interim Dividend for FY 2023-24 of Rs. 4 per share.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Corporation, at their
meeting held on Friday, 11th November, 2022, have approved unaudited financial results of the
Corporation for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2022.
